期.definition: a period of time; phase; stage; classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study; time; term; period; to hope; Taiwan pr. [qi2]

期待.definition: to look forward to; to await; expectation

期房.definition: forward delivery apartment; unfinished housing to be paid for in advance by the buyer and then completed within certain time frame

期指.definition: futures index (abbr. for 期貨指數|期货指数[qi1huo4 zhi3shu4])

期望.definition: to have expectations; to earnestly hope; expectation; hope

期末.definition: the end of a term or semester (in school)

期滿.definition: to expire; to run out; to come to an end

期貨.definition: abbr. for 期貨合約|期货合约[qi1 huo4 he2 yue1], futures contract (finance)

期間.definition: period of time; time; time period; period; CL:個|个[ge4]
